title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1154/95 of 22 May 1995 adopting a protective measure applying to imports of garlic originating in Vietnam
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1154/95 of 22 May 1995 adopting a protective measure applying to imports of garlic originating in Vietnam
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The issuing of import licences for garlic (CN code 0703 20 00) originating in Vietnam as referred to in Regulation (EEC) No 1859/93 is hereby suspended until 31 May 1996.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 June 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 May 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
